actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the act to encourage domestic travel in order to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to carry out the purposes of such act.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Commerce to make grants available, on a matching basis with non-Federal funds, to States or subdivisions thereof, or private or public nonprofit organizations or associations, for the purpose of encouraging and promoting travel within the United States and its territories.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act to encourage domestic travel in order to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to carry out the purposes of such act.
